Business Analyst in Tech Summary Education Skill Sets Salary and Working Hours

Business Analyst in Tech In this chapter we will cover the following content: what does business analysts do in Tech industry what skill-sets are required and preferred what is a day-to-day like for a business analyst in Tech what is the difference between business analyst, data analyst, data scientist, and machine learning engineer how does they work in teams (with engineers and scientists, with stakeholders, with product managers, etc.) Summary Education Skill Sets Hard Skills: SQL (basic query, join methods, aggregate functions, window functions) for ETL & data mining Python (basic Python data structures, list and string manipulation) Excel (how in-depth?) AB Testing (Basic stats knowledge, hypothesis testing) Preparing and executing presentation slides on business level data Soft Skills: design business metrics Problem solving Communication Salary and Working Hours Industry Average Working Hours: 8-10 hrs Industry Entry Level Average Salary: $97,112/yr Base: $70,921/yr Bonus: $26,191/yr Tier 0 Tier 1 Tier 2 Tier 3
